case_title: JAVAID RIZVI vs GOVERNMENT OF BALUCHISTAN Through Services And General Administration Department And Another
respondent: Government of Baluchistan Through Services And General Administration Department And Another

charges.charge_1: Payments made to contractor without provision for horizontal or vertical reinforcement, causing cracks and loss of Rs.3,75,134.30.
charges.charge_2: Use of cement concrete blocks below required specifications, causing alleged defects.
charges.charge_3: Failure to exercise 10% test checking, leading to payments worth Rs.40,05,940 without proper checks.
charges.charge_4: Measurements recorded in contravention of B&R Code.
charges.charge_5: Failure to hand over list of works in hand, causing loss of Rs.31,49,103 due to non-renewal of bank guarantee.

findings.charge_1: No provision in contract for horizontal or vertical reinforcement; charge dismissed.
findings.charge_2: Structure demolished before testing; appellant not responsible for quality checks; charge dismissed.
findings.charge_3: Consultants solely responsible for quality and quantity checks; charge dismissed.
findings.charge_5: Bank guarantee extended during appellant's tenure; charge dismissed.

key_points.disciplinary_procedure: Show-cause notice issued without thorough inquiry or evidence recording.
key_points.discrimination: Sub-Divisional Officer reinstated despite greater responsibility; appellant treated unfairly.
key_points.appeal_decision: Order of removal from service set aside; appellant reinstated with back benefits.
